name: Driver's Late Nightmare - Road Trip Gone Wrong
name_original: Driver's Late Nightmare - Road Trip Gone Wrong
description:
Driver's Late Nightmare takes place in an unknown highway. You take control over your own very old car which runs out of gas fast, but you need to get home, otherwise you might get into trouble.

This game is just me experimenting with vehicle movement, with added gameplay and a rainy, late night setting. Very highly inspired by a game called BEWARE made by Ondrej Svadlena.

Thanks a ton for playing!
